content: bobble helmet copyright designs byzula 2010 us and uk stitch versions included this bobble helmet was designed as a customer pattern request and i decided to make it available for everyone hope you enjoy making this funky helmet - materials small/medium h hook regular/large j hook approx 118m/130yds aran weight yarn us to uk stitch conversion single_crochet single_crochet = double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet = treble_crochet treble special stitches 5-double_crochet bobble *yarn over insert hook into st yarn over draw loop through st draw through 2 loops on hook* repeat this 4 times more you should have 6 sts on hook draw yarn through all 6 sts and chain 1 1 5-double_crochet bobble made treble_crochet dtr step 1 yarn over three times then insert hook into next stitch step 2 yarn over hook and draw yarn through stitch there are five loops on the hook step 3 *yarn over and draw through two loops on hook* there are now four loops remaining on the hook repeat from * to * 3 more times this completes one double treble_crochet stitch us stitch version form a ring using magic loop method 1 chain 2 12 double_crochet in ring join to top of 1st double_crochet 12 2 chain 2 1 double_crochet and 1 5-double_crochet bobble in same st *1 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet and 1 5-double_crochet bobble in next st* continue around join with slip_stitch to top of 1st double_crochet 18 3 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in same st 2 single_crochet in each st around ending with 1 single_crochet in last st join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 36 4 chain 3 1 5-double_crochet bobble in next st *skip next st 1 double_crochet in next st 1 5-double_crochet bobble in next st* around ending with bobble join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 36 5 chain 1 turn 1 double_crochet in same st *2 double_crochet s in next st 1 double_crochet in next st* around to end slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 54 6 chain 3 turn 1 5-double_crochet bobble in next st *skip next st 1 double_crochet in next st 1 5-double_crochet bobble in next st* around ending with bobble slip_stitch to top of chain 3 54 7 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in next st and in each st around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 54 8 chain 1 turn skip next st 1 double_crochet in next st *1 5-double_crochet bobble in next st skip next st 1 double_crochet in next st* around ending with bobble st slip_stitch to top of chain 1 54 9 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in same st and in each st around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 54 10 chain 1 turn skip next st 1 double_crochet in next st *5-double_crochet bobble in next st skip next st 1dc in next st* around ending with bobble st slip_stitch to top of chain 1 54 11 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in next st and in each st around continue to
